add(String, ConnectionProducer) - Method in class com.topcoder.db.connectionfactory.DBConnectionFactoryImpl

C

ConfigurationException - exception com.topcoder.db.connectionfactory.ConfigurationException.
An exception to be thrown by DBConnectionFactoryImpl being initialized from a parameters provided by a configuration namespace if any error occurs while reading the configuration parameters, instantiating and initializing the ConnectionProducers.
ConfigurationException(String) - Constructor for class com.topcoder.db.connectionfactory.ConfigurationException
Constructs new ConfigurationException with the given message providing the details of the error occurred.
ConfigurationException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for class com.topcoder.db.connectionfactory.ConfigurationException
Constructs a new ConfigurationException, with the given message and cause.
ConfigurationException(Throwable) - Constructor for class com.topcoder.db.connectionfactory.ConfigurationException
Constructs new ConfigurationException with the given cause.
ConnectionProducer - interface com.topcoder.db.connectionfactory.ConnectionProducer.
The interface specifying the API for the producers of a connections to a specific databases.

DBConnectionFactory - interface com.topcoder.db.connectionfactory.DBConnectionFactory.
An interface defining the factory API that enables the clients to obtain the connections with a specific database.

This is the helper class added in version 1.1.

J

JDBCConnectionProducer - class com.topcoder.db.connectionfactory.producers.JDBCConnectionProducer.
A ConnectionProducer obtaining the connections to a database by the means specified by JDBC 1.0 specification, namely a DriverManager provided with a JDBC-compliant URL string and a connection properties is used to obtain a connections to a database.
JDBCConnectionProducer(String) - Constructor for class com.topcoder.db.connectionfactory.producers.JDBCConnectionProducer
Constructs new JDBCConnectionProducer with specified JDBC URL to be used to obtain a connections to a database.
JDBCConnectionProducer(String, String, String) - Constructor for class com.topcoder.db.connectionfactory.producers.JDBCConnectionProducer
Constructs new JDBCConnectionProducer with specified JDBC URL and a username/password pair to be used to obtain a connections to a database.
JDBCConnectionProducer(String, Properties) - Constructor for class com.topcoder.db.connectionfactory.producers.JDBCConnectionProducer
Constructs new JDBCConnectionProducer with specified JDBC URL and connection properties to be used to obtain a connections to a database.

Deprecated.

JDBC_DRIVER_CLASS_PROPERTY - Static variable in class com.topcoder.db.connectionfactory.producers.JDBCConnectionProducer
A String specifying the name of a configuration property providing the fully-qualified name of a JDBC driver class to be loaded to obtain the connections to a database.
JDBC_URL_PROPERTY - Static variable in class com.topcoder.db.connectionfactory.producers.JDBCConnectionProducer
A String specifying the name of a configuration property providing the JDBC URL to be used to obtain the connections to a database.
JNDIConnectionProducer - class com.topcoder.db.connectionfactory.producers.JNDIConnectionProducer.
A DataSourceConnectionProducer obtaining the DataSource from a JNDI context using the provided JNDI name.
JNDIConnectionProducer(String) - Constructor for class com.topcoder.db.connectionfactory.producers.JNDIConnectionProducer

Constructs new JNDIConnectionProducer with specified JNDI name to be used to locate the requested DataSource within initial JNDI context and username/password pair to be used to obtain a connections to a database.

A String specifying the name of a configuration property providing the JNDI name to be used to locate the DataSource to be used to obtain the connections to a database.

N

NoDefaultConnectionException - exception com.topcoder.db.connectionfactory.NoDefaultConnectionException.
An exception to be thrown by DBConnectionFactory.createConnection() and DBConnectionFactory.createConnection(String, String) methods if the default connection is not configured within the factory.

NoDefaultConnectionException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for class com.topcoder.db.connectionfactory.NoDefaultConnectionException
Constructs a new NoDefaultConnectionException, with the given message and cause.

PASSWORD_PROPERTY - Static variable in class com.topcoder.db.connectionfactory.producers.JDBCConnectionProducer

R

ReflectingConnectionProducer - class com.topcoder.db.connectionfactory.producers.ReflectingConnectionProducer.
A DataSourceConnectionProducer instantiating the DataSource through Java Reflection API being provided with the fully-qualified name of class implementing the DataSource interface.

Constructs new ReflectingConnectionProducer with specified fully-qualified name of class implementing the DataSource interface to be used to instantiate the DataSource to be used to obtain the connections to a database.

Constructs new ReflectingConnectionProducer with specified fully-qualified name of class implementing the DataSource interface to be used to instantiate the DataSource to be used to obtain the connections to a database.

UnknownConnectionException - exception com.topcoder.db.connectionfactory.UnknownConnectionException.
An exception to be thrown by:
(1)DBConnectionFactory.createConnection(String) and DBConnectionFactoryImpl.createConnection(String, String, String) methods if the connection corresponding to specified name is not configured within the factory.
UnknownConnectionException(String, String) - Constructor for class com.topcoder.db.connectionfactory.UnknownConnectionException
Constructs new UnknownConnectionException with specified name of the requested connection and a textual description of the error.
UnknownConnectionException(String, String, Throwable) - Constructor for class com.topcoder.db.connectionfactory.UnknownConnectionException
Constructs new UnknownConnectionException with specified name of the requested connection, a textual description of the error and a cause of error.
